mapper.insert: insert into memberInfo(m_idx,m_id, m_pw, m_email, m_phone, m_ping, m_failCnt, m_regDate, m_fixDate, m_lastDate, m_status) values(last_insert_id()+1,#{m_id},md5(#{m_pw}),#{m_email},#{m_phone},#{m_ping},0,now(),now(),now(),1)
mapper.select: select count(*) from memberInfo where m_Id = #{m_id}
select count(*) from memberInfo where m_Id = #{m_id} and m_pw = md5(#{m_pw})
select m_failCnt from memberInfo where m_Id = #{m_id}
mapper.update: update memberInfo set m_failCnt = m_failCnt+1 where m_Id = #{m_id}
mapper.select: select m_idx from memberInfo where m_Id = #{m_id}
mapper.update: update memberInfo set m_failCnt = 0, m_refreshToken = #{m_refreshToken} where m_idx =#{m_idx}
